title: 推荐一个适合做RPG古风地图1.12.2可用的
author: 兰陵缭乱看
txt_content: 如题，求推荐一些古风小镇地图，要小型的

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content:
兰陵缭乱看 发表于 2020-2-23 17:02
这个好像只能用于公益服，没有那种小型城镇的古风地图吗
为保证作者权益，我直接列出网址，请你自行下载
https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/jiangyuan-china-jiangnan-garden/
https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/april-cherry-tree-sakura-island/https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/booshi---the-city-of-elements/
https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/windmill-/
https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/dojo-1464020/
PMC的古风地图还是少的，可以在在站内找找看
